title.content: Does Nathan miss the bus for the school trip?

clue1.content: Nathan sets off walking to school at 8:20 am.

clue2.content: It takes 15 minutes to walk to the park from Nathan's home.

clue3.content: Running is twice as fast as walking.

clue4.content: The bus leaves the school at 9:20 am.

clue5.content: The shops next to the park are busy with people buying newspapers and children getting sweets.

clue6.content: Nathan runs back home to get his packed lunch and runs all the way back to the park.

clue7.content: When Nathan gets to the park he realizes he has left his packed lunch behind.

clue8.content: It takes 15 minutes to walk from the end of the park to school.

clue9.content: It takes 10 minutes to walk across park or 15 minutes to walk round it. His mother doesn't like him going through the park. He takes a minute to decide what to do.

clue10.content: Nathan is a good boy and always does what his mother tells him.

clue11.content: On the other side of the park Nathan has to wait 4 minutes for the traffic lights to change so he can cross the road safely.

clue12.content: Nathan was really looking forward to this school trip.
